author: colizz
body:
#### PR description:

**This is a 11_1_X backport from #32636**

Fix the ExternalGeneratorFilter argument passing to python config. 
The fix is needed by UL run on 10_6_X. It is therefore applied to 11_3_X, 11_2_X, 11_1_X, and 10_6_X.

#### PR validation:

See #32636.
title: [11_1_X] Fix the ExternalGeneratorFilter argument passing to python config
